title: Find Position of Substring
description:
FINDP searches in a string STR starting at position POS for a string SRC. If
SRC found in the string so the position of the frst character of SRC in STR
is returned. If the string starting at position POS is not found, an 0 is retur￾ned. If an empty string is specifed as the search string, the module deli￾vers the result 0.
name: FINDP

input.name: str
input.description: The string in which to search for the substring.

input.name: src
input.description: The substring that is being searched for in the main string.

input.name: pos
input.description: The position from which to start searching in the main string.

return_value.description: The position of the first occurrence of the substring; returns 0 if the substring is not found.
